title: How long does it take for Riot support to answer a ticket?
body:
I've had one support ticket up for 4 days and the other for 2. I haven't recieved a reply on neither of those.
In case someone is gonna read this I transferred servers and was given a random summoner name instead of letting me change it.

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and see that a specialist replied to your ticket this morning.  You also have quite a few tickets open, which can cause delay and confusion towards helping out.  It's usually best to stick to a single ticket and not reply until you received a response, otherwise you can drop back to the bottom of the queue.  If you have any further concerns, hit up your specialist!
IS it possible for you to look into my ticket right now
